title: Oh, Boy: Beto Shares Another Strange Video On Social Media
text:
2020 Democratic presidential candidate Beto O'Rourke is one of the most eclectic politicians out there. After all, he enjoys recording videos of himself going to the dentist.

Not very many candidates are that engrossed in their campaign that they would even think to record a dental cleaning, let alone post it.

But then again, he also recorded a video of himself changing a tire. Apparently that is supposed to really generate the votes.

We even got an "inside look" the Beto making cheeseburgers. Impressive, isn't it?

Beto makes a burger pic.twitter.com/PywGSE58jD — Behind 2020 (@Behind2020) August 24, 2019

And he struck again on Thursday when someone from his team captured the former Texas Congressman attempting to get his campaign mini van pulled out of the mud.

Beto gets stuck pic.twitter.com/RuAZFGn8yj — Behind 2020 (@Behind2020) September 19, 2019

Whoever thought people cared what Beto is doing on a 24/7 basis really needs to reevaluate their campaign's political strategy...and the polls. The attempt at appealing to Millennials by posting everything on social media can only go so far. We get it. You have doctor's appointments. You get flat tires. You cook. You clean. You're trying to relate to voters. Somethings though are better left a secret. Your car getting stuck and your teeth getting clean are two of them.
